name: Hench Kart Racer
description:
Hench Kart Racer is a training sim/skittle guzzler/card puzzler in which you assume the role of a Hench Kart Racer. You must stuff your face with skittles in order to get enough energy to train your mind, arms and legs. Face off in card based races to see who will get to the finish line first!

CRITERIA:

Kart Racer: The player partakes in a kart pulling race within the mechanics of a card game.

Skittles: Skittles are used in this game to fuel the player. The more of your favourite skittle that you consume, the more energy you have for training your character.

Anatomically Incorrect: As you level up the various parts of your body, each muscle will grow to anatomically incorrect proportions.

Chiptune: The background music in the game is chiptune "music". It can be muted in the menu by pressing escape and dragging the slider down to the bottom.

BEST PLAYED FULL-SCREEN.

Created using:

* Unity

* GIMP

*SFXR

DISCLAIMER:

Title font is not my creation. It is the comic andy font located here: https://www.1001fonts.com/comic-andy-font.html

An alpha shadow was created before the jam and used for light in this game.
